text: The 2011–12 Red Bull Salzburg season brought the 7th title for Salzburg and the 4th since the Red Bull takeover. They won the cup for the first time in the club history. ==Squad== 2011/12 * Goalkeepers: 1 Eddie Gustafsson (15 matches/0 goals), 20 Niclas Heimann (0/0), 33 Alexander Walke (21/0), * Defenders: 3 Douglas da Silva (11/0), 5 Chema Anton (4/0), 6 Christian Schwegler (22/0), 8 Petri Pasanen (18/0), 17 Andreas Ulmer (20/1) , 22 Stefan Hierländer (20/0), 23 Ibrahim Sekagya (26/1), 25 Jefferson (8/0), 36 Martin Hinteregger (21/0) * Midfielders: 4 David Mendes (16/1), 10 Cristiano da Silva (15/3), 11 Gonzalo Zárate (25/1), 14 Jakob Jantscher (27/14), 15 Franz Schiemer (19/0), 16 Felix Adjei (1/0) 18 Dušan Švento (31/3), 19 Simon Cziommer (18/0), 21 Rasmus Lindgren (20/1), 24 Christoph Leitgeb (23/2), 28 Luigi Bruins (3/0), 32 Marco Meilinger (0/0), 35 Daniel Offenbacher (2/0), 38 Stefan Savic (2/0), 39 Georg Teigl (23/2) * Forwards: 7 Roman Wallner (14/3), 9 Stefan Maierhofer (29/14), 26 Jonatan Soriano (11/3), 27 Alan (5/3), 29 Alex Rafael (1/0), 30 Leonardo (30/4), 43 Joaquin Boghossian (0/0) *Coaching staff:Ricardo Moniz (Head coach), Niko Kovač (Assistance coach), Herbert Ilsanker (Goalkeeper coach) ==Matches== Austria Soccer ==Table== Team M W D L Goals Points 1\.
